sense.name: the prestige or regard that someone possesses
sense.examples: He is an architect of international stature. These public scandals have diminished the film star's stature. They are a bunch of losers with low stature in their community.

sense.name: a person's (or animal's) natural height
sense.examples: Basketball players are usually of very tall stature. Mary liked to wear high heels to counterbalance her small stature. Arabian horses tend to be of smaller stature than thoroughbreds.
